lead_paragraph: New Zealand's rugby sevens side suffered a major blow in their preparations for the Rio Olympics after loose forward Ardie Savea opted to withdraw from contention in order to concentrate on the 15-man game.

headline.print_headline: New Zealand's Savea Withdraws From Olympic Contention
headline.main: New Zealand's Savea Withdraws From Olympic Contention
